name: @web-starter/infra-lorenzogm
description: Terraform infrastructure for lorenzogm app on Vercel

scripts.state:encrypt: cd src && echo "$TERRAFORM_STATE_ENCRYPT_KEY" | openssl enc -aes-256-cbc -in terraform.tfstate -out terraform-$TF_VAR_ENVIRONMENT.tfstate.enc -pass stdin && rm -f terraform.tfstate
scripts.state:decrypt: cd src && echo "$TERRAFORM_STATE_ENCRYPT_KEY" | openssl enc -aes-256-cbc -d -in terraform-$TF_VAR_ENVIRONMENT.tfstate.enc -out terraform.tfstate -pass stdin
